snippet: Tom Mockridge, a longtime News Corporation official who served as chief executive of the company’s British newspapers in the aftermath of a phone hacking scandal, announced on Sunday that he will step down.
abstract: Tom Mockridge, a longtime News Corporation official who served as chief executive of the company’s British newspapers in the aftermath of a phone hacking scandal, announced on Sunday that he will step down.

headline.main: Chief of News Corp. Unit in Britain Is Resigning
headline.print_headline: Chief of Unit Of News Corp. Is Resigning
